title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: People
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People               People         Several of the Little Rock Nine leave Central under federal troop escort. CHMI/UALR Archives  Learn more about the nine African American students who desegregated Little Rock Central High School in 1957.  More...        Flyer for the Women's Emergency Committee   Click here to learn more about the Women's Emergency Committee to Open Our Schools. More...         See Mike Wallace interview Orval Faubus and Harry Ashmore in 1957 by following these links to the Harry Ransom Center at the University of Texas at Austin. Orval Faubus Harry Ashmore
